ABOUT US

We strive to positively impact our clients by ensuring access to financial services through technological friendly and innovative ways.

OUR VISION

To be the leading and most innovative financial services provider to all at world class standard.

OUR MISSION

To leverage on technology in impacting the lives and businesses of our clients by ensuring access to financial services in a most innovative way.

OUR VISION

Integrity | Innovation | Accessibility | Friendliness | Professionalism | Excellence | Speed and Accuracy

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER

Accelerex MICROFINANCE BANK

Accelerex Microfinance Bank is founded with focus on the financially unserved and underserved. We are people oriented, with the aim of providing all with basic financial services in an innovative and easily accessible manner.

Omololu Akinjide Adewalure

Chief Operations Officer

Omololu Akinjide Adewalure is the Chief operations officer. He has had 9 years working experience in banking operations. He started his banking experience with Skye bank as a customer experience management personnel and then moved to Guaranty Trust Bank in 2010. He has functioned at various times in different capacities in banking operations and back up Head of operations GTBank until he joined Accelerex Microfinance Bank. He is a member Nigerian Institute of management and Chartered Institute of Bankers of Nigeria.

Anara Chinyere Grace

Head, Operations

Grace Anara is the head Banking Operations. She is a customer service expert, with 10 years banking operations experience. She has functioned in various capacities in Fortis microfinance Bank. She left Fortis Microfinance as Head Banking operations with 16 branches under her supervision to join the Accelerex Microfinance bank Team.

TEMITOPE AKINYEMI

Chairman of the Board

Temitope AKINYEMI is an accomplished Financial and Investment Adviser, Transaction Adviser and Public Private Partnership (PPP) advisor. He has over 19 years’ experience in finance. He had worked for the Power Team at the Bureau of Public Enterprise (BPE) under the Presidency in Nigeria. He also was one of three Portfolio Managers at Nigeria Sovereign Investment Authority (NSIA). While there, had direct responsibility for the Authority’s largest portfolio of PPP toll road projects including Second Niger Bridge and Lagos Ibadan Express road. He is a chartered financial analyst also an MBA Dual Concentration in Finance and Strategy, Yale School of Management, USA

STANLEY UGOCHUKWU PETERS

Non Executive Director

Stanley Peters is an accomplished Executive with experience in operations, electronic payments and mobile money solutions both locally and internationally. He has business interest in electronic payments solutions and emerging technological needs of the financial industry. He currently serves as an Executive director Technolgy and innovation Global Accelerex Limited.

Oluwaseun Peters

Non Executive Director

Oluwaseun Peters is an associate member of The Institute of chartered accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) with cognate experience as the Chief Financial Officer of Global Accelerex a payment service provider in Nigeria licenced by CBN. She was manager Financial Advisory Manager Deloitte and Touche Nigeria and West Africa, likewise she once served as Senior Associate Deal Advisory services KPMG Nigeria. She holds a Global Masters in Finance from IE Business School, Madrid Spain.
